org.javalite.common

Class JsonHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javalite.common.JsonHelper

  • public class JsonHelper
extends Object
    Convenience class to convert JSON strings to and from objects.
    Author:
    Igor Polevoy on 5/26/16.

      • sanitize

        public static String sanitize(String value,
                              boolean clean)

      • sanitize

        public static String sanitize(String value,
                              boolean clean,
                              char... toEscape)
        Escapes control characters in a string when you need to generate JSON. This method is based on: Gson JsonWriter.
        Parameters:
        value - input string
        clean - if true will remove characters that match, if false will escape
        toEscape - array of characters to escape. If not provided, it will escape or clean '"','\\', '\t', '\b', '\n', '\r' '\f'. This paramers will only escape or clean if provided chars are from this list.
        Returns:
        input string with control characters escaped or removed, depending on the clean flag.
